bibdata.title: IEEE Recommended Practice for Instruction Manual Content of AC High-Voltage Circuit Breakers above 1000 V
Redline
IEEE Recommended Practice for Instruction Manual Content of AC High-Voltage Circuit Breakers above 1000 V - Redline

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This recommended practice is intended to identify, organize, and summarize information about ac high-voltage circuit breakers provided by the manufacturer that knowledgeable users will find useful for the receipt, installation, commissioning, operation and maintenance, and decommissioning of ac high-voltage circuit breakers above 1000 V. Recommended categories and an arrangement for the presentation of information in circuit breaker instruction manuals is covered in this recommended practice.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
